name.en: Eternal Wolf of the Blaze Fiends
name.ja: <ruby>焔<rt>えん</rt></ruby><ruby>魔<rt>ま</rt></ruby>の<ruby>永<rt>えい</rt></ruby><ruby>狼<rt>ろう</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: Send 1 Fiend Type monster from your hand to the Graveyard.

effect.en: Destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field. Then, if you sent a Level 10 monster to the Graveyard to meet the requirement, you can add 1 Level 4 Fiend Type monster with 0 ATK from your Graveyard to your hand.
